about.name: Kocaeli Travel Guide
about.title: Kocaeli, Turkey - Discover History, Nature!
about.description: Come plan your trip to see! Enjoy with history! Taste some food!
about.excerpt: That journey awaits you. What are you waiting for?
about.content:
Kocaeli, Turkey blends nature and culture like no other location! It allows many people to have all that nature and even local culture! From mountains to local tastes, you will have a memory of a lifetime! What are you waiting for? Let's explore the best of this guide to travel!

## Start That Plan!

Everything that we are gonna cover is two days of adventures. You need a unique reason to explore! With the best locations, this will be a journey!

## List Of Why It Is Awesome!

It's up to you. The location is amazing, you don't want to miss out on what the heart can sing!

### The Amazing Attractions For You To Uncover

Wanting that perfect day? Well, start with the Darıca Faruk Yalçın Hayvanat Bahçesi ve Botanik Parkı so kids can enjoy. And if you are a history person, there is the İzmit Saat Kulesi to see. This helps to capture the history of the heart.

### Mother Earth's Beauty!

If nature is your main touch then there is more! See what natural beauty comes alive with Kartepe Ormanı! Also, want to know the sunsets from above then visit Kartepe Sapanca Gün Batımı, and those photos will be the talk of the town. After that, you should also go to Serindere Başiskele Kanyonu, it will capture that explorer!

### Culture and sounds, what more to have?

The heart of local culture is what the mind craves. Let the heart beat with Kocaeli Yöresel Müzikleri and you will never want to leave. That culture has more. You can even shop local with Karamürsel Sepeti. Make sure to have that money in your pocket!

### For You to Enjoy To The Max!

What all makes this so amazing? The cuisine! With the best taste that is all local! You will also taste history. What should you taste? All would say you want to have İzmit Pişmaniyesi to have that unique local taste!

## Now You Will Start To Plan

With what to see and hear. It is your choice to create this magic. So pack a good heart and travel this path in Turkey. All welcomes you!
